SELECT TLM.MEMBER_SEQ ,TLM.MEMBER_ID ,TLM.PASSWORD ,TLM.COM_CODE ,FN_COM_CODE(TLM.COM_CODE) AS COM_CODE_NM ,TLM.MEMBER_NAME ,TLM.EMAIL ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO ,TLM.DEPT_NM ,TLM.POSITION_NM ,TO_DATE(TLM.JOIN_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS JOIN_DT ,TLM.ROLE_NAME ,TLM.TERMS_YN ,TLM.TERMS_DATE ,TLM.APPR_STAT ,FN_CD_DTL('MEM001',TLM.APPR_STAT) AS APPR_STAT_NM ,TLM.FILE_SEQ ,TLM.FAIL_CNT ,TLM.CRE_YN ,TLM.DROP_YN ,TLM.UPD_SEQ ,TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP ,TLM.MSG FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS TLM
AND MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

SELECT
TLC.COM_CODE ,TLC.COM_NAME ,TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,FN_BIZ_NO(TLC.PL_BUSINESS_NO) AS PL_BUSINESS_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLC.COMP_PHONE_NO) AS COMP_PHONE_NO FROM TB_LC_COMPANY TLC
AND TLC.DEL_YN = 'N' AND TLC.COM_CODE != 1
AND TLC.COM_CODE = #{comCode}
AND TLC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comName}, '%')

SELECT TLC.COM_CODE ,TLC.COM_NAME ,TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NO ,FN_BIZ_NO(TLC.PL_BUSINESS_NO) AS PL_BUSINESS_NO ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLC.COMP_PHONE_NO) AS COMP_PHONE_NO FROM TB_LC_COMPANY TLC
AND TLC.COM_CODE = #{comCode}

INSERT INTO TB_LC_COMPANY ( COM_NAME /*회원사(상호명)*/ ,PL_MERCHANT_NO /*법인등록번호*/ ,PL_BUSINESS_NO /*사업자등록번호*/ ,COMP_PHONE_NO /*회사대표번호*/ ,REG_TIMESTAMP /*등록일시*/ ,REG_SEQ /*등록자 시퀀스*/ ) VALUES ( #{comName} /*회원사(상호명)*/ ,#{plMerchantNo} /*법인등록번호*/ ,REPLACE(#{plBusinessNo}, '-', '') /*사업자등록번호*/ ,REPLACE(#{compPhoneNo}, '-', '') /*회사대표번호*/ ,NOW() /*등록일시*/ ,#{regSeq} /*등록자 시퀀스*/ )

UPDATE TB_LC_COMPANY SET UPD_TIMESTAMP = NOW() /*수정일시*/ ,UPD_SEQ = #{updSeq} /*수정자 시퀀스*/
,COM_NAME = #{comName} /*회원사(상호명)*/
,PL_MERCHANT_NO = #{plMerchantNo} /*법인등록번호*/
,PL_BUSINESS_NO = REPLACE(#{plBusinessNo}, '-', '') /*사업자등록번호*/
,COMP_PHONE_NO = REPLACE(#{compPhoneNo}, '-', '') /*회사대표번호*/
AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}

UPDATE TB_LC_COMPANY SET DEL_YN = 'Y'
AND COM_CODE = #{comCode}
